name: Astral ascent
description: Badeline rushes to the position you marked and launches you upward upon touching, just like in the old days.

actions.command: function madelinetheclimber:baddieraycast
execute as @e[tag=badelinetarget, sort=nearest,limit=1] at @s run tp @s ~ ~ ~ facing entity @p[tag=zbyszeqs_madeline,sort=nearest,limit=1]
execute as @e[tag=badelinetarget, sort=nearest,limit=1] at @s run tp @s ^ ^ ^1
function madelinetheclimber:baddieraycast
execute as @e[tag=badelinetarget, sort=nearest,limit=1] at @s run tp @s ~ ~ ~ facing entity @p[tag=zbyszeqs_madeline,sort=nearest,limit=1]
execute as @e[tag=badelinetarget, sort=nearest,limit=1] at @s run tp @s ^ ^ ^1
title @s actionbar "§dYou're really testing my patience, you know that?"
title @s actionbar "§dDo I look like a trampoline to you?"
title @s actionbar "§dThis is, without a doubt, THE worst plan you ever had."
title @s actionbar "§dYou REALLY can't function without me, can you?"
title @s actionbar "§dI'd help, but... nah."
title @s actionbar "§dOh no... looks like you have to do something yourself."
title @s actionbar "§dNo. absolutely not. climb it yourself."
title @s actionbar "§dLook, I get that you want a shortcut, but come on!"
title @s actionbar "§dThis is just embarrassing. For both of us."
title @s actionbar "§dCall me again, and I'll drop you next time!"
title @s actionbar "§dJust once, I'd love to see you solve a problem WITHOUT me."
title @s actionbar "§dYou've made some bad choices before, but THIS is the next level."
title @s actionbar "§dDo you even think before calling me?"
title @s actionbar "§dYour personal lift is out of order!"

entity_action.command: execute as @e[tag=badelinetarget, sort=nearest,limit=1] at @s run particle minecraft:happy_villager ~ ~1 ~ 0.1 0.5 0.1 2 1 force

actions.command: summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Invisible:1b,Marker:1b,Glowing:1b,NoGravity:1b,PersistenceRequired:1b,Tags:['badeline'],ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:iron_nugget,components:{custom_model_data:48481},count:1}],ArmorDropChances:[0f,0f,0f,0f]}
execute as @e[tag=badeline, sort=nearest,limit=1] at @s run tp @s ~ ~ ~ facing entity @e[tag=badelinetarget,sort=nearest,limit=1]
execute as @e[tag=badeline, sort=nearest,limit=1] at @s run tp @s ^ ^ ^0.12
kill @e[tag=badelinetarget,sort=nearest,limit=1]
resource set @e[tag=zbyszeqs_madeline,sort=nearest,limit=1] madelinetheclimber:resources_badelinereachedtarget 1
title @p[tag=zbyszeqs_madeline,sort=nearest,limit=1] actionbar "§a[badeline has reached her destination]"
item replace entity @s armor.head with minecraft:iron_nugget[minecraft:custom_model_data=48481] 1

entity_action.command: execute as @e[tag=badeline, sort=nearest,limit=1] at @s run tp @s ~ ~ ~ facing entity @e[tag=zbyszeqs_madeline, sort=nearest,limit=1]

actions.command: item replace entity @e[tag=badeline, sort=nearest,limit=1] armor.head with minecraft:iron_nugget[minecraft:custom_model_data=48483] 1
item replace entity @e[tag=badeline, sort=nearest,limit=1] armor.head with minecraft:iron_nugget[minecraft:custom_model_data=48484] 1
item replace entity @e[tag=badeline, sort=nearest,limit=1] armor.head with minecraft:iron_nugget[minecraft:custom_model_data=48485] 1
item replace entity @e[tag=badeline, sort=nearest,limit=1] armor.head with minecraft:iron_nugget[minecraft:custom_model_data=48486] 1
item replace entity @e[tag=badeline, sort=nearest,limit=1] armor.head with minecraft:iron_nugget[minecraft:custom_model_data=48487] 1
kill @e[tag=badeline]
execute as @e[tag=badeline] at @s run tp @e[tag=zbyszeqs_madeline] ^ ^ ^0.5
